Reviews.Title: Great old technology
Reviews.Author: steve berlau
Reviews.Content: This is a ten year old phone, but it arrived looking new. Had the phone store re-program it, which took ten minutes, and it was ready to use.Works great, looks great, and everyone still makes fun of me and my flip phone. I love it.Steve

Reviews.Title: Bad.
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Package smelled so bad I had to throw it away.  There is no way I could have used this product.

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because it was my first cell phone when i was 17-18 i remember it working really well. Something to do with the new technology of verizons way of connecting phones is incompatible with some older phones. This is one of them, i contacted zerizon and they tried about 4 different ways of connecting the phone to their service, but nothing worked.i like the older flip phones vs the new smart phones and some still work well. You just cant go too far back. i would recommend the:Motorola V750 Adventure PTT RuggedandLG enV2 VX-9100For inexpensive phones that work well.
